title: BDO Offer to Buy & Buyer’s Profile — Real Estate (Individual / Sole Proprietorship)

fields.label: Date Received
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY (date BDO received this OTB form).

fields.label: Buyer Type

fields.label: Account Sales Officer
fields.summary: For BDO use only — leave blank unless instructed.

fields.label: Deferred Cash

fields.label: For Loan Take-out / Home Loan

fields.label: Principal Full Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle.

fields.label: Date of Birth

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write city/municipality and province/country.

fields.label: Citizenship
fields.summary: Write nationality (e.g., Filipino).

fields.label: Gender

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick: Single • Married • Annulled/Divorced • Separated • Widow/er.

fields.label: Present Address + Zip Code

fields.label: Initial Requirements
fields.summary: Submit: • Fully-accomplished OTB form (no blanks; put N/A if not applicable) • Two (2) valid Government-issued IDs (clear copies; with 3 specimen signatures) • Check (personal/manager’s) = 5% of offered price as Reservation Fee • Authority to Offer and Register (ATOR), if with referror.

fields.label: Other Required Documents (as applicable)
fields.summary: Attach items such as: • Proof/Source of Income (Payslip, Employment Certificate w/ compensation, Contract w/ Compensation, Latest ITR, Bank Statement/Passbook, Financial Statement, Proof of Remittance, DTI Registration/Business Permit) • Civil status docs (CENOMAR, Marriage Contract, Court Orders) • NSO/PSA Birth Certificate • Death Certificate of spouse • SPA & AIF forms (BDO templates; consularized/apostilled if abroad) • Dual citizenship docs (Oath of Allegiance, BP 185 Affidavit) • Alien docs (ACR & Passport) • FATCA/certifications • TIN Verification (for loan take-out). Use the checklist on form and tick submitted items.

fields.label: Submitted Valid IDs (slots)
fields.summary: Fill in ID types and numbers for each ‘Submitted Valid IDs’ slot provided.
